QuestData.Title: Into the Boneslag
QuestData.Description: The Thunderlords took prisoners into the Boneslag?$B$BWell what are we waiting for?! We have to go after them!$B$BYou look for the missing villagers - Asha and I will track Karg.
QuestData.LogDescription: Search the Boneslag for the missing Frostwolf orcs.
QuestData.RewardText: Thank you for finding the others. Karg and his captor are one step ahead of us, but they're limping.
